title.rendered: Vitakraft® Crunch Sticks Fruit & Honey Guinea Pig Treat

content.rendered:
Ingredients:
Rabbit with Ground Bone, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed, Potassium Chloride, Organic Cranberries, Organic Spinach, Organic Broccoli, Organic Beets, Sodium Phosphate Monobasic, Organic Carrots, Organic Squash, Organic Apples, Organic Blueberries, Choline Chloride, Dried Pediococcus Acidilactici Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus Acidophilus Fermentation Product, Dried Bifidobacterium Longum Fermentation Product, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Taurine, Tocopherols (Preservative), Calcium Carbonate, Zinc Proteinate, Zinc Sulfate, Iron Sulfate, Iron Proteinate, Vitamin E Supplement, Niacin, Copper Sulfate, Copper Proteinate, Manganese Sulfate, Sodium Selenite, Manganese Proteinate, Thiamine Mononitrate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Calcium Iodate

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude protein (min) 30%, Crude fat (min) 15%, Crude fiber (max) 3.5%, Moisture (max) 11%.

excerpt.rendered:
DESCRIPTION
Treat your guinea pig to a crunchy, long-lasting baked treat stick made with whole grains, fruit, honey, and fortified vitamins. Vitakraft Crunch Sticks don’t just taste good: they also promote important chewing needed to wear down guinea pigs’ always-growing teeth for optimum dental health. The triple-baked layers make this treat last longer, with a natural wood chew center that provides hours of chewing fun long after the treat part is gone! Designed specifically for guinea pigs with extra Vitamin C.

Key Benefits:

Enriched with important vitamins, amino acids, and calcium
Provides ideal amount of extra protein during times of stress or moulting
For even more variety, add in chopped veggies, sprouts, and fruit
Antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals help maintain healthy skin, while biotin assists in feather development

Item Number: 5073166

Brand: Vitakraft

Food Type: Treat

Breed Size: Guinea Pig

Flavor: Fruit & Honey

Weight: 3.5 oz

Buy this product on petsmart.com
